category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_CREATE_SCO_WITHOUT_APN
preference.preference_description: Enables the creation of Structure Context Objects (SCO) without creating the Appearance Path Nodes (APN), only for the "Design Context" application. If it is set to true (default value), SCO will be created without creating the APNs for the BOMLine objects. If set to false, SCO will be created with APNs for the BOMLine objects.
